availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Payne (Mercer County, merchant and farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer and merchant. Native of Ireland. Married to Delilah Payne. Father of Kittie A. Payne. Owned thirteen enslaved people in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 27
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 6
U.S. Find A Grave Index, 1600-Present, William Payne, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=139094161&ref=acom accessed 06/02/2017.
